sn51.19:4.1: “Iddhiṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi iddhipādañca iddhipādabhāvanañca iddhipādabhāvanāgāminiñca paṭipadaṃ.
sn51.19:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
sn51.19:5.3: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti … pe …
sn51.19:6.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, maggo yā paṭipadā iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati—
sn51.19:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi … pe …
sn51.19:8.3: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi—
